data: ADULT/PED ED MHA Form 4 x 1 Orders (Module)
Status
Involuntary admissions under the Mental Health Act alter a client’s fundamental legal and human rights. It is critical that all relevant MHA Forms are completed in a timely manner.
MHA Form 4 x1 Involuntary Admission
Consults/Referrals

The Provider and a Director/Delegate is responsible for completing MHA Form 5. Social Workers and Nurses are responsible for completing MHA Forms 13, 15, 16. Selecting the following orders will help ensure that Social Workers and Nurses are notified of a client’s certification.
Social Work Consult
Urgent, Mental Health or Substance Use, Client is certified under MHA Form 4. Forms 13, 15, 16 must be completed within 24 hours
MHA Form 4 x 1 Supplementary Forms
MHA Form 4 x 1 has been submitted for this client. Supplementary Forms 5, 13, 15, 16 must be completed within 24 hours

With the client’s permission, a consult to Indigenous health supports (or Indigenous cultural/wellness supports) should be offered within 24 hours of certification. With the client’s permission and consent, please order this consult if it is applicable to the client
Aboriginal/Indigenous Consult
Reason for Consult: Mental Health Act Form 4 has been submitted, the client has requested and consented to an Indigenous Health Consult
